name: Balora
overview: Balora, NGSoft’s User experience Analysis & Design division, can help you design and develop your next product. With the help of our experienced and creative designers you can achieve a usable and appealing application design, analysis and R&D for all devices, whether it’s a mobile, web, TV or a desktop application. We consist of professionals in the areas of Human Factors, Software Usability, Interactive Design and visual communications as well as top developers. Balora offers a true multi disciplinary approach, best design methodologies and emphasizes its experience with services covering a new product development cycle: Functional Requirements Specifications, User Interface Analysis and Design, Visual Branding & Corporate Identity development, GUI Design and Production & Usability Testing.
